entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: N 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
